text: @RandPaul Colloidal silver renders some virus inactive on contact. By inhaling nebulized  cs, say, (1 drop of 250ppm in 5cc of water) u could kill the virus inside your lungs. Ask your doctor about this possible treatment. It has helped me get rid of lung infections before #coronavirus
